prompt: Change the text ‘Deliver Services’ in the image to ‘Package Services’.
knowledge_prompt:
Changing “Deliver Services” to “Package Services” requires the model to recognize that the modification shifts the meaning from an action-oriented phrase (“to deliver”) to a service-oriented phrase (“package services”).
The semantic expectation is that while the specific wording changes, the overall theme of logistics and service provision remains consistent.
Visually, the new text should maintain the same font weight, alignment, and color harmony as the original to ensure the design balance and visual hierarchy stay unchanged.
